simplified_text:
Esme is so glad.
The sun is bright.
She goes to school.
She likes to play.

text:
Little Esme bounced with joy today,
As morning sunshine lit her way.
At kindergarten, she would dance and play,
While learning new things in her special way.

lines: Little Esme bounced with joy today,
As morning sunshine lit her way.
At kindergarten, she would dance and play,
While learning new things in her special way.

simplified_text:
Esme sees her friends.
They play with blocks.
She makes them big.
Up, up they go.

text:
The classroom buzzed with happy sounds,
As friends made castles, towers, and mounds.
"What shall we build?" asked Esme with glee,
While stacking blocks as high as could be.

lines: The classroom buzzed with happy sounds,
As friends made castles, towers, and mounds.
"What shall we build?" asked Esme with glee,
While stacking blocks as high as could be.

simplified_text:
Look! Who is there?
It is Gram and Pop!
They wave at her.
Time to go home.

text:
When school was done, what did she spy?
Her grandparents waving from nearby!
"Surprise!" they called with loving faces,
"We've come to take you special places!"

lines: When school was done, what did she spy?
"We've come to take you special places!"

simplified_text:
The sky gets dark.
Rain comes down fast.
No bike ride now.
Esme must think.

text:
But as they walked toward home that day,
Dark clouds rolled in, they couldn't stay.
Would rain stop Esme's bike ride fun?
She'd need to think of what could be done!

lines: But as they walked toward home that day,
Dark clouds rolled in, they couldn't stay.
Would rain stop Esme's bike ride fun?
She'd need to think of what could be done!

simplified_text:
"I can ride inside!"
She has a plan.
The bike can go.
She rides so slow.

text:
"I know!" said Esme, bright and bold,
"Let's make an indoor course to hold!
Through living room and down the hall,
We'll ride so slow we cannot fall!"

lines: "I know!" said Esme, bright and bold,
"Let's make an indoor course to hold!
Through living room and down the hall,
We'll ride so slow we cannot fall!"

simplified_text:
Esme has fun.
She rides and rides.
This is the best.
She likes this day.

text:
The afternoon turned magical and bright,
As Esme steered with pure delight.
Sometimes the best adventures start
When we use our head and follow our heart.

lines: The afternoon turned magical and bright,
As Esme steered with pure delight.
When we use our head and follow our heart.
